description: This sweet and spicy rub marries well with pork and chicken. Rub it over your meat of choice before barbecuing for a hit of chilli.
keywords: Marinade & rubs,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Nov 2020,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Brown Sugar & Chilli Rub Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Rub it over pork or chicken before barbecuing.
